metadata.title: CVE-2025-0426 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: A security issue was discovered in Kubernetes where a large number ofcontainer checkpoint requests made to the unauthenticated kubelet read-onlyHTTP endpoint may cause a Node Denial of Service by filling the Node'sdisk.

criterions.comment: kubernetes package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
